opinion.posture: Criminal proceedings. Burglary, theft by unlawful taking of disposition, theft by receiving stolen property, criminal conspiracy and resisting arrest. Before McCRUDDEN, J. No. 933 Oct. T., 1979. Appeal from the judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, Sept. T., 1978, Nos. 828-830.
opinion.attorneys: John W. Packel, Chief Appeals, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant; Eric B. Henson, Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.Page 598
opinion.panel:
Before BROSKY, WICKERSHAM and ROBERTS, JJ.[fn*]
[fn*] Justice Samuel J. Roberts of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania is sitting by designation.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment affirmed.
ROBERTS, J. concurred in the result.
